description: Macrium Reflect is a disk imaging and backup software that enables users to create images of their drives. It provides functionality to view the Windows Recovery Environment (Win RE) partition size, displaying total, used, and free space. The tool comes with a free edition that allows homeowners to assess the Win RE partition. Macrium Reflect can be utilized to recover lost data by restoring complete disk images. Additionally, it allows users to explore the folder structure of the Win RE partition, giving insights into the current Windows RE files, their sizes, and dates.
